title: Names of God: The Lord
description:
Readings from:

Deuteronomy 10:17-18

Psalms 8:9; 90:1-2

Romans 10:9-13

Colossians 2:6-7

Today's passages were read by Erin Straza, managing editor of Christ and Pop Culture, communications consultant, and author of Comfort Detox: Finding Freedom from Habits That Bind You (InterVarsity Press).
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
